block.p: Stacey Wong was married yesterday to Anthony Armstrong Breaks at the Sutton Place Hotel in Newport Beach, Calif. The Rev. Dr. Paul C. Ystebo performed the nondenominational ceremony.
Mr. and Mrs. Breaks, both 24, graduated from the Massachusetts Institute of Technology.
Stacey Wong was married yesterday to Anthony Armstrong Breaks at the Sutton Place Hotel in Newport Beach, Calif. The Rev. Dr. Paul C. Ystebo performed the nondenominational ceremony.
Mr. and Mrs. Breaks, both 24, graduated from the Massachusetts Institute of Technology.

The bride is an associate at Goldman, Sachs & Company, the New York investment bank. She is a daughter of Jenny and Douglas Wong of Newport Coast, Calif. Her parents own Vogue Enterprise, a company in Irvine, Calif., that imports and distributes parts for window blinds.

The bridegroom works in New York for the Liberty Hampshire Company, an asset management and financial services concern, for which he evaluates and structures commercial debt issues. He is the son of Carolyn and Jackson D. Breaks of Sinking Spring, Pa. His mother is a director of Digital Wireless Systems, a provider of wireless television service in Reading, Pa. His father is the president of McGlinn Capital Management, a company money manager in Wyomissing, Pa.
